Module gaudin.firstscreen
Package controller

Class ModifyProductFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class runs the Modify Product Form. FUTURE ENHANCEMENTS. I recommend adding the ability to update the product ID, so you can group certain products together. This will make the main table more organized.

    • setMainProduct

      public static void setMainProduct(Product product)
      Sets mainProduct.
      Parameters:

    • onActionAddPartToProduct

      public void onActionAddPartToProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds Part to associatedParts. Adds the selected part to associatedParts from partBankTableView and the assocPartsTableView table.
      Parameters:
      event - takes a button click ActionEvent.

    • onActionExitModifyProduct

      public void onActionExitModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Displays the Main Form. The user clicks the cancel button and the method displays the MainForm scene.
      Parameters:
      event - takes a button click ActionEvent.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionPartSearch

      public void onActionPartSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Searches allParts. The user types in the id number or partial/full name of a part and the table updates to only containing Parts that match the search criteria.
      Parameters:
      event - takes a text input ActionEvent.

    • onActionRemovePartFromProduct

      public void onActionRemovePartFromProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes Part from Product's associatedParts. Prompts the user, and removes the selected part from the Product object's associatedParts and the assocPartsTableView table.
      Parameters:
      event - takes a button click ActionEvent.

    • onActionSaveProduct

      public void onActionSaveProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Saves user inputted Product. Prompts the user, creates a new Product object and uses it to update the prior Product object. It then changes the scene to the Main form.
      Parameters:
      event - takes a button click ActionEvent. RUNTIME ERROR. I originally wrote this code without the "try""catch" statements and when I tested the form by entering letters in the productInvTxt field it had a runtime error. I then implemented the "try" "catch" statements and this fixed the issue.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      Displays and loads the Modify Product Form and its tables. The method initializes when the ModifyProductForm scene is loaded. It sets the partBankTableView table and displays the Add Product Form.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - scene path.
      rb - the resource bundle/XML file used.
